Articles.Content:
Where can i see the weight and the DV of my rocket? In some threads they speak of how much dv you need to escape (for example) from mun and reenter kerbin atmosphere. But i cant see my potential dv anywhere. Is it only possible with mods?

Same for the weight of the ship.

Edited October 23, 2013 by Pupu

dV is only possible with mods (mechjeb and KER - kerbal engineer redux are the most used ones).

Mass of the ship you can view in mapview by clicking the i icon on the righthand side (also shows part count).
The other option is to calculate it by hand. But yeah, in game it's only possible with mods. I use KER myself.
You might want to check out this thread that was started earlier today
